venue.name: AstraZeneca Hope Lodge Center in Boston

item.description:
From the AstraZeneca Hope Lodge website, www.cancer.org/hopelodgeboston :

The AstraZeneca Hope Lodge Center in Boston, a program of the American Cancer Society, provides a safe, supportive, and self-sufficient home away from home for those in active outpatient cancer treatment. For more information, and to see a virtual tour of our state-of-the-art facility offering 40 private suites and a variety of common areas free of charge, visit our website at the address above.

We'll be spending the evening playing Bingo with the residents at the AstraZeneca Hope Lodge. It's always a good time an you're assured to have fun!

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: AstraZeneca Hope Lodge: Bingo Night!
